an5.115:1.1: “Mendicants, a nun with five qualities is cast down to hell.
an5.115:1.3: She is stingy with dwellings, families, material possessions, praise, and the teaching.
an5.115:1.4: A nun with these five qualities is cast down to hell.
an5.115:2.1: A nun with five qualities is raised up to heaven.
an5.115:2.3: She is not stingy with dwellings, families, material possessions, praise, or the teaching.
an5.115:2.4: A nun with these five qualities is raised up to heaven.”
